TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content: When does Squadcast come on?

When does Squadcast come on?

6:30-7:30 Pm Squad time IIRC.

Ah, it's on right now.

[edit]

Features video played. Cool stuff!

1. Upgradeable buildings

2. New parts menu features, allowing you to sort them and even put them in custom groups

3. Mk3 parts with cargo bays -- no word on whether new landing gear is in

4. Biomes, including a color-coded biome display in the map view (although Max says that the map will be in the debug menu)

All in all, looks like a feature-packed update.

Edited December 13, 2014 by GusTurbo
Ooh hype! They showed the features vid on twitch!
Editor looks very very nice!
I had an ad as the feature video was played, I really hate twitch sometimes...
Really loving this update, so many new toys to play with! *cough* usable cargobays *cough*
Features video is up!
This is gonna be awesome! And it should be just in time for Christmas holidays. And the wife should be happy on her new iPad so I'll have the 'puter to myself to KSP the holidaze awayze!
"ive just got one question and one question only........Hypsplosions?!?!?!"

YEEAHAWWW!

Or, to explain: I AM VERY EXITED AND FOUND A QUOTE TO EXPRESS THAT!
Features video! Choo choo!
This update is gonna steal my winter break...
This. Is. Amazing.

I've got one question for you. Just ONE question.

Are you hyped yet? Well, are ya, punk?

Okay, so, earlier I said that we could expect a massive shipment of HypeCoal... scratch that. We just rammed straight through 20 tanks of raw Hype and the back of the train is on fire now.

Seriously though, this update is freaking awesome.
Bum bum (Hype Hype Hype!) Bum bum, bum bum, bum bum!
I want x1 antimatter.

"ive just got one question and one question only........Hypsplosions?!?!?!"

I used to use them..... turns out they are to hard to contain...
That MK III shuttle in the feature video had a cluster engine at the end, and a science lab in its cargo bay. MK III Parts are as big as the SLS parts now, and they fit together well!
I hope the Part Highlighting, like announced, is in the update, because it wasn't able to see in the trailer
Well if we are lucky in a week maximum we will have it! If you compare the date of other playtrough + release it's about 4-5 days
In the playthrough we saw the new biomes via the tracking station... Does this mean we can now see biome maps from the tracking station if we so desire?! that would be freaking awesome!

In the playthrough we saw the new biomes via the tracking station... Does this mean we can now see biome maps from the tracking station if we so desire?! that would be freaking awesome!

They're available to view at any time in game, but only if activated via the debug menu.

They're available to view at any time in game, but only if activated via the debug menu.

You learn something new every day!
